meta.@content: Standard Naval Tactical Display Symbology (NTDS) icons
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

-children.#comment: These first two Protos are common to all symbology

ProtoDeclare.@appinfo: NTDS Symbology for vector
NTDS Symbology for label

field.@appinfo: Additional information for the track (i.e. track number entityID entity name)

ProtoDeclare.@appinfo: NTDS Symbology for surface vessel, classification pending
NTDS Symbology for surface vessel, classification unknown
NTDS Symbology for surface vessel, classification friendly
NTDS Symbology for surface vessel, classification neutral
NTDS Symbology for surface vessel, classification assumed friendly
NTDS Symbology for surface vessel, classification suspected hostile

-children.#comment: TODO: Save -> Symbol Geometry (broken lined square)

-children.#comment: Ground Equipment (exactly the same as Sea Surface symbols)

-children.#comment: Viewable geometry for this scene is anchored text that links to an example showing ExternProtoDeclare usage of BeamCylinder
Transparent box to simplify user selection (i.e. "clickability")
